name: Global Uniques
uniques: Nullifies [Culture] [in all cities]

Notified of new Barbarian encampments
City-State territory always counts as friendly territory
[+1] Unit Supply <for every [Units]>
[-100]% maintenance costs

Improves movement speed on roads

Enables embarkation for land units
Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles
Enables conversion of city production to [Gold]
[{Zombie Slave} {Human}] units gain the [Dead Worker] promotion <upon turn end>
Nullifies Growth [in all cities]

unitUniques: Free [Serf] appears <upon defeating a [Military] unit> <for [Undead] Civilizations>
Free [Serf] appears <upon defeating a [Military] unit> <for [Demonic] Civilizations>

Free [Den Builder] appears <upon entering a [Barbarian encampment] tile> <for [Wildmen] Civilizations> <for [non-[Den Builder]] units> <when number of [Owned [Tame Beast den] Tiles] is less than [[Cities] * 3]>

Free [Settler] appears <upon entering a [Barbarian encampment] tile> <for [Wildmen] Civilizations> <for [non-[Den Builder]] units> <when number of [Owned [Tame Beast den] Tiles] is more than [[Cities] * 3 - 1]>
May enter foreign tiles without open borders
Triggers a [What Is This] event <for [Human] Civilizations> <upon discovering a [Undead Tech] tile>
